name: PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Bureau of Liquor Control Enforcement, Respondent/Appellee, v. HARRY'S HOLIDAY PARK LOUNGE, INC., Petitioner/Appellant
name_abbreviation: Pennsylvania State Police v. Harry's Holiday Park Lounge, Inc.

parties: PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Bureau of Liquor Control Enforcement, Respondent/Appellee, v. HARRY’S HOLIDAY PARK LOUNGE, INC., Petitioner/Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of January, 2003, the order dated December 17, 2002 in reference to 446 WAL 2002 granting the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby rescinded. The appeal docket No. 81 WAP 2002 is hereby dismissed as Moot.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
857 A.2d 671
PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Bureau of Liquor Control Enforcement, Respondent/Appellee, v. HARRY’S HOLIDAY PARK LOUNGE, INC., Petitioner/Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 13, 2003.
